query.statement: MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST802 A USING (SELECT CAST(#G_MANDT# AS VARCHAR(3)) AS MANDT, CAST(#POSID# AS VARCHAR(24)) AS POSID, -- CAST(#REQNO# AS VARCHAR(10)) AS REQNO, CAST(#GRP# AS VARCHAR(15)) AS GRP, CAST(#COD# AS VARCHAR(15)) AS COD FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 )B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.POSID = #POSID# --AND A.REQNO = #REQNO# AND A.GRP = #GRP# AND A.COD = #COD# WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET POSID = #POSID#, REQNO = #REQNO# , GRP = #GRP# , COD = #COD# , CNM = #CNM# , KND = #KND# , KNM = #KNM# , ERNAM = #G_USER_ID#, ERDAT = HEX(CURRENT DATE) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( MANDT , POSID , REQNO , GRP , COD , CNM , KND , KNM , CHK , PDM_CHK , ERNAM , ERDAT , VBELN ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #POSID# , #REQNO# , #GRP# , #COD# , #CNM# , #KND# , #KNM# , 'Y' , '' , #G_USER_ID# , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , #VBELN# )
